changes_over_time.FEV1_progression: Increased progressively reaching reference normal values (up to 98%) after 4 months

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Skin prick test to wheat flour and alpha-amylase were highly positive.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Skin prick test repeated after 6 months revealing the absence of wheal.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Asthma Control Test (ACT) score increased from an initial value of 11 to 25 at the fourth month.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement persisted without change after the fourth month.
